title: Business Manager
summary: Apple is looking for a multifaceted, highly motivated Business Manager to join the Worldwide Product Marketing (WWPM) Business Management and Finance team.
description: - Influence and drive business/product decisions for the Apple product-lines in cross-functional partnership with Product Marketing Managers...
preferred_qualifications: Deep passion for Apple’s products and mission, Ability to work comfortably under ambiguity to deliver fully developed and well-reasoned analyses, Strong and structured communicator, Ownership mindset and high agency to take a proactive role in leading project work-streams from end-to-end, Strong attention to detail and ability to 'see around corners’, High proficiency in Excel modeling, with strong competency (or aptitude to learn) R, SQL, Tableau, and Python, Adept at working cross-functionally and managing senior stakeholder relationships, Comfort navigating product or engineering topics with keen interest to ramp on new and un-familiar technical content
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role. The base pay range for this role is between $107,300 and $161,300...
